descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset is collected for the purpose of using it later on my meetups for sentiment analysis demo on a real data. You can use it as you wish, it will be a good case of data wrangling, text classification, sentiment analysis, and anything else. Sharing it here is just to make it easier for my friends and those interested in a ready dataset from Twitter.

### Content

These tweets are collected using Twitter streaming API on the 4th of March 2018. Tweets are filtered based on two words [ Wakanda, Black Panther ] and saved the following:

 1. Tweet's text.
 2. Username.
 3. Languages
 4. Location.
    Time.

This dataset is not labeled and therefore it won't be fit to be used for training any model unless you wish to experiment with clustering methods.
title: Twitter Black Panther
subtitle: Twitter conversations about Black Panther (unlabelled)
description:
### Context

This dataset is collected for the purpose of using it later on my meetups for sentiment analysis demo on a real data. You can use it as you wish, it will be a good case of data wrangling, text classification, sentiment analysis, and anything else. Sharing it here is just to make it easier for my friends and those interested in a ready dataset from Twitter.

### Content

These tweets are collected using Twitter streaming API on the 4th of March 2018. Tweets are filtered based on two words [ Wakanda, Black Panther ] and saved the following:

 1. Tweet's text.
 2. Username.
 3. Languages
 4. Location.
    Time.

This dataset is not labeled and therefore it won't be fit to be used for training any model unless you wish to experiment with clustering methods.
